availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Armilda A. Dame in January 1859. Farmer in McLean County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean, unknown, p. 127. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Rolls #994027-994058, McLean County Marriages, p. 1. Find A Grave, “Hardin G. Stringer (November 13, 1835-November 12, 1914,” Memorial #64871522, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=64871522 (accessed June 4, 2012).
